title: Sister gives up inherited land to brother, then demands to have it back after property values skyrocket: 'Now that it’s valuable, they want it back'
description: When there's a will, there's an argument. There is nothing like a family will to unearth years of resentment and drama within the sibling dynamic. This is why all decent and generous parents should consider ahead of time that their children might not be civil after they're gone. In fact, their absence might only embolden the greediest folks in the family to reveal their true selves.Keep scrolling below for this father's unfortunate falling out with his sister seven years after he thought their parents' inheritance had been fully handled.
author: Ben Weiss
excerpt: Sister gives up inherited land to brother, then demands to have it back after property values skyrocket: 'Now that it’s valuable, they want it back' - The internet has generated a huge amount of laughs from cats and FAILS. And we all out of cats.
text: This author watched their father have an intense falling out with his sister after she practically begged her brother to take her portion of their parents' land seven years ago. However, her feelings about the land suddenly changed when she learned that property values have since skyrocketed. Unfortunately for the father, now, his sister wanted the land back. To make matters even worse, she enlisted the support of some of their other siblings to try to convince their brother to change his mind. Luckily, this man had some spine and refused to cave.
